{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.24054v1", "title": "Infinite matrix associated to sequences", "summary": "In this paper, we study the Euler-Seidel matrices with coefficients and
determine the associated Riordan matrix to a given matrix, if it does exist.
Computation of the generating fonction of the final sequence is established by
the associated Riordan matrix. Applications are given.", "main_category": "math.CO", "categories": "math.CO", "published": "2025-03-31T13:15:17Z"}
